meanings.definition: To put a new shoe on.
meanings.sent1: I need to reshoe my favorite sneakers.
meanings.sent2: She decided to reshoe her worn-out boots.
meanings.sent3: After stepping in a puddle, he had to reshoe his shoe.
meanings.sent4: The cobbler will reshoe my heels with care.
meanings.sent5: Don't forget to reshoe your shoes before the hiking trip.

meanings.definition: To replace a shoe with a new one.
meanings.sent1: The athlete had to reshoe his cleats before the game.
meanings.sent2: It's time to reshoe my dress shoes for the upcoming event.
meanings.sent3: She accidentally reshoe'd her left shoe with the right one.
meanings.sent4: He reshoe'd his old sneakers with brand new ones.
meanings.sent5: The store offers to reshoe any damaged shoes for a reasonable price.
